item.title: How many posts does it take to become a Community Member?

item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

ruler:

rep is not worth here was it was at kaitnieks, i had 175 rep on kait. Here ppl get rep for making useless things at kaitneiks one had to program.

Yep, plus rep was increased in non-constant intervals depending on the rep of the person who was giving it to you. Here’s its constant 1.

item.title: How many posts does it take to become a Community Member?
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

[quote=“Taios, post:13, topic:18279”][quote author=blacker link=topic=27298.msg313586#msg313586 date=1160799713]

[quote author=Taios link=topic=27298.msg313557#msg313557 date=1160799380]

[quote author=blacker link=topic=27298.msg313490#msg313490 date=1160798287]

[quote author=DeadBird link=topic=27298.msg313482#msg313482 date=1160798174]
Any amount of decent, helpful, and friendly posts.
Thats how many.
[/quote] seriously? So I spent all this time posting tuts and guies etc just to find out that I’m gonna stay a Senior Member until I become friendly? NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO.[br][size=1]Posted at: October 13, 2006, 05:57:43 PM[/size][hr][quote author=Taylor link=topic=27298.msg313487#msg313487 date=1160798227]

50 you know, No posts
[/quote] No I mean whats CM status? lol
[/quote]community member
[/quote]o lol

??

You need 50 rep for cm, or be an old cm on kaitnieks
[/quote] Well then how come your a Community Member and you only got 11 rep? OOOOOOOOOOO PWNED!

Because i was an ex-kaitnieks community member you n00b.[/quote]

Taios owns. End of discussion =)

Read full topic
